headline: Marotta Controls Secures Contract with L3Harris for Thrust Vector Control System Development
summary: Win expands Marotta’s product portfolio into new market sector Marotta Controls Secures Contract with L3Harris for Thrust Vector Control System Development Marotta Controls has been awarded a contract by L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) to design, develop, qualify, and deliver production flight actuator hardware for an advanced thrust vector control (TVC) system. content.title: Marotta Controls Secures Contract with L3Harris for Thrust Vector Control System Development
content.summary: Win expands Marotta’s product portfolio into new market sector Marotta Controls Secures Contract with L3Harris for Thrust Vector Control System Development Marotta Controls has been awarded a contract by L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) to design, develop, qualify, and deliver production flight actuator hardware for an advanced thrust vector control (TVC) system. This contract win marks a significant milestone for Marotta, positioning the company as a competitive player in the TVC market for th

thumbnail.caption: Marotta Controls has been awarded a contract by L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) to design, develop, qualify, and deliver production flight actuator hardware for an advanced thrust vector control (TVC) system. This contract win marks a significant milestone for Marotta, positioning the company as a competitive player in the TVC market for the first time.
